Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe it would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. We're extending this exclusive opportunity to you with a special offer of $15000. This price reflects the value we place on maintaining a selective clientele who appreciate the craftsmanship and innovation behind our products. We look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you and your business. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
